words.prompt: When things are put _____________, they are moved to one side.
People of the same _____________ share the same way of life at a certain time in history.
I am _____________ when I treat my friends in a just and honest way.
When people are _____________, they are asked in a nice way to do something or to go somewhere.
_____________ is the way we speak, read, write, or sign.
When you _____________ for something, you beg or argue to get what you want.
When something _____________, it scampers or runs quickly.
When I _____________, I give part of something I have to someone else.
_____________ are things someone or something does.
When you are _____________, you are scared of something.
When you _____________ on someone, you need or count on them.
When you act _____________, you act in a fearful or restless way.
_____________ means looked hard or looked closely at something.
When something is done _____________, it is done in the best possible way.
When you _____________ something, you save it from danger.
A _____________ is something that is private or not known by many people.
When you _____________ something, you look at it closely to make sure it is right.
When you _____________, you decide on one thing rather than another.
Your _____________ are small jobs that you do around the house.
The _____________ of something is how much you have to pay for it.
_____________ are people who buy something from a store or company.
_____________ are the work that people do to earn money.
When you _____________, you use money to buy or pay for something.
_____________ are equipment used to make or repair things.
